description:
Fire’s classroom gains a new transfer student by the name of Kaede Mayumi.  Mayumi seems to angrily want to say “what do you even know about Oreca!?” to Fire.  Meanwhile, Pandora invites Fire to battle in a real colosseum.  Fire and the others are brought to “Pyramid”, the newest attraction in an amusement park owned by the Kaede Family.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 打ち鳴らされるDJのゴング
